title: Episode #12: ADD and ADHD Part 1
description: Throughout my 30 years in the fields of education and science I have worked with many people misdiagnosed with ADD and ADHD. In this podcast, I begin the discussion on ADD and ADHD. Is this label even scientific? How do we help children with this label?
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
itunes:summary: Throughout my 30 years in the fields of education and science I have worked with many people misdiagnosed with ADD and ADHD. In this podcast, I begin the discussion on ADD and ADHD. Is this label even scientific? How do we help children with this label?
